This fix (2017/09/12) is based on code base of V 11.40,
which fix font dictionary overflow at PDF generation

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To apply the fix just unpack 
http://www.bakoma-tex.com/dist/x1140/fix/font-fix170912.zip
in BaKoMa TeX folder. 

Check that the file "BaKoMa\Category\Level2\Font.cat" have been replaced. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: This fix will be included into version 11.41
